articles.description: WORDLE fans have been treated to the first puzzle of the weekend, and this one is particularly tricky. Fortunately, Express Online is here to help, courtesy of three spoiler-free clues.
articles.content: Saturday is here, alongside a brand new Wordle puzzle for you to solve over your Corn Flakes. Wordle 294 is available for 24-hours only, so you'll need to hurry if you want to keep that winning steak… [+1685 chars]

articles.title: All the Old Knives Review - IGN
articles.description: Not necessarily the best of this genre, but All the Old Knives is a solid character drama benefiting from strong performances by a top-drawer cast.
articles.content:
All the Old Knives is now streaming on Prime Video.
Just over eight years ago, Chris Pine starred in Jack Ryan: Shadow Recruit
